author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:
Removes `customizeSiStripAPVDynamicGainSimulation.py `which is now unnecessary as its purpose is fully replaced by this commit: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/d2bc424a6fb0478058da7ff2aa450eae7932e49e introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28355.

#### PR validation:

None, but this file at this point is not in active use, so there is no dependency.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not needed.
title: remove customizer for SiStrip APV dynamic gain simulation
